welcome.body: What is Quran.com worth to you? This Ramadan, we are bringing you more value than ever.<2/><2/> Millions of users worldwide depend on our up-to-date technology and authenticated content, and we need your support to keep growing. <2/><2/> <0>Learn more</0> and become a supporter
